text: Brian Doyle-Murray (born Brian Murray; October 31, 1945) is an American comedian, screenwriter, actor and voice actor. He is the older brother of actor/comedian Bill Murray and the two have acted together in some movies. He appeared on the movies Caddyshack, Scrooged, Ghostbusters II, The Razor's Edge and Groundhog Day. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Screenwriters from Illinois Category:Actors from Illinois Category:Comedians from Illinois Category:Writers from Illinois
title: Brian Doyle-Murray
